briefTitle: Remission Evaluation of a Metabolic Intervention in Type 2 Diabetes With Sitagliptin (REMIT-Sita)
officialTitle: An Open-label, Randomized, Parallel Design Trial to Compare the Efficacy of a Sitagliptin-based Metabolic Intervention Versus Standard Diabetes Therapy in Inducing Remission of Type 2 Diabetes

primary.measure: Number of Participants With Hyperglycemia Relapse in the Experimental Group Compared to the Control Group
Number of Participants With Severe Hypoglycemic Episodes

secondary.measure: Number of Participants Achieving Drug-free Diabetes Remission
secondary.description: Diabetes remission is defined as absence of hyperglycemia relapse

secondary.measure: Number of Participants With Drug-free Normal Glucose Tolerance
secondary.description: Normal glucose tolerance is defined as a FPG\<6.1 mmol/L and a 2-hour plasma glucose \<7.8 mmol/L on a 75 g oral glucose tolerance test
